ext_name.message: Export cookie JSON file for Puppeteer

ext_desc.message: Export a cookie JSON file that can be imported by Puppeteer.

important_message.message: The cookie may contain important security information such as website session IDs, so please be careful when handling it. (If the session ID is leaked, there is a possibility that your account will be hijacked)

no_cookies.message: No cookies are stored on the currently open page
